tweet.text: Studying the history of U.S. foreign relations with the Americas? Current/recent grad students, apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications accepted from Sept. 28 to Oct. 12 https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/NVPQRg58u7
